summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs of the Dallas City Council will convene on December 23, 2024, at 9:00 AM. The meeting will be held both in-person at Dallas City Hall and virtually, with the purpose of discussing key administrative matters, particularly the selection of candidates for the city manager position.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The primary focus of the meeting will be the interview and deliberation of candidates for the city manager role, as recommended by Baker Tilly. The committee will compile a list of final candidates to present to the City Council for consideration.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will begin with the approval of minutes from previous meetings held on December 12 and December 16, 2024. The candidate interviews may take place in a closed session, adhering to Texas Open Meetings Act provisions regarding personnel matters.

**Action Items**:  
The committee is seeking approval of the minutes and aims to finalize a list of candidates for the city manager position to recommend to the City Council. Additionally, the meeting may include an executive session to discuss legal matters or personnel evaluations, as necessary.

This meeting is critical for shaping the leadership of the city and ensuring effective governance moving forward.
